title: Add bulk delete for PO line items

title: Show original pre-PO amount in bills for cost codes

Acceptance Criteria:

- Calculation shows variance from original to PO amount

title: Auto-recalculate price book when builder margin or GST changes
description:
When the builder's margin or GST % is changed, the price book should automatically recalculate. Currently this is not happening.

Issue Details:
- Verified on 18th January 2026 at 5pm
- Changing builder margin does not trigger price book recalculation
- Changing GST % does not trigger price book recalculation
- Price book values remain stale until manually recalculated

Acceptance Criteria:
- When builder margin is updated, all price book items recalculate automatically
- When GST % is updated, all price book items recalculate automatically
- Recalculation happens in real-time or with clear feedback
- Existing price book data is preserved during recalculation
